wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Lucas (1805–1870) was a British amateur painter who worked in Hitchin as a brewer.

response: *Samuel Lucas (1811–1865), British abolitionist and newspaper editor
Samuel Lucas (1811–1865) was abolitionist and newspaper editor.

*Samuel Lucas (1805–1870), British amateur painter and brewer
